column3:
ゲルドの伝統競技 スナザラシラリーに
命知らずの挑戦者が現れた！
column4:
A challenger has appeared to take on the
Gerudo sand-seal race! Apparently one
who does not mind risking life and limb!

column3:
不敗を誇る チャンピオンの記録…
果たして超えることはできるのかっ？！
column4:
But will our current record fall? The one
set by our undefeated champion?!

column3:
砂漠の獣…
スナザラシの準備は整った！
column4:
The incomparable beast of the desert...
The sand seal is ready to ride!

column3:
全てのアーチをくぐり分秒以内に
ゴールできるのかっ？！
column4:
Can our new contestant reach the goal in
less than:"while still
passing under every arch?!

column3:
それじゃあ…
カウントを始めるよーっ！！
column4:
The suspense is killing me!
I'm going to start...the...
countdoooooown!!
